Sorry for the late heads up, but I just spoke with Miguel from and he has a truck showing up around 0900 today, May 22nd, to pick up the GCPs for 11-175 and 11-176 to bring to Louisiana.  Can you please be prepared to load these and do any paperwork that is required?

 

 

With Respect,

 

 <https://url.us.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/KA4xC0RpvJTk7BjDhDR3UE?domain=dynamisps.com/> 

	Parker Hodges
Engineering Project Manager

Cell:  225-229-9323
www.dynamisps.com <https://url.us.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/KA4xC0RpvJTk7BjDhDR3UE?domain=dynamisps.com/> 

 

	
	
Dynamis Power Solutions: 1780 Hughes Landing Blvd, Suite 130, The Woodlands, Texas 77024, United States

 

INNOVATION NOT IMITATION

metadata.subject: Material Movement Request - ETI GCP DPS asset 11-175 and 11-176

content:
Hey Miguel,

Just left you a VM. We are in need of a few items .

-Roxtec kits (same supplied in GCP, qty6 per)
-Memory cards HMI
-Contactor 600v siemens. (Unit 7 part 4 field)

I need to double check, i am sure there is more we need..

Also we have 2 qty GCP to send your way.

Can you advise status of the 2 qty GCP that are +85% completion last week.
Maybe when we take  of those 2, they pick these other 2 for left side sub-pan scope, etc.

Regards,





Sent from my iPhone

Good morning, I did a quick review of the DE2.5 cable schedule and I found many problems with the jumper, they are hard to read and many of the looks like are moved, mainly in the GCP-TB tab.

 

Thanks

 

 

Paul Tovar
Senior Controls Engineer

Dynamis Power Solutions: 1780 Hughes Landing Blvd, Suite 130, The Woodlands, Texas 77024, United States

 

INNOVATION NOT IMITATION
